title: Close a Customer Account
description: A customer requests to have their online account and all associated data deleted.

tasks.description: Verify the customer's identity to ensure they are the true owner of the account.
tasks.expected_outcome: The agent confirms the identity of the person making the request.

tasks.description: Inform the customer that deleting their account is permanent and will erase their order history and loyalty points.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer understands the consequences and confirms they wish to proceed.

tasks.description: Initiate the account deletion process in the customer management system.
tasks.expected_outcome: The customer's account is flagged for deletion in accordance with data privacy regulations.
